title: I hope my death recap was bugged...
body:
Because some Orianna was proccing Thunderlord's with only 1 spell cast. I don't know how she was doing it. But I would check my death recap, it would show:

Orianna (Either assist or killer, I noticed it twice)
Command: Protect XXX Magic Damage
Thunderlord's Decree XXX Magic Damage

No auto attacks, no other form of damage. Nothing. And she was somehow proccing T-lords.
